title: Yogalaya or Fitness Centre: In every residential building, either existing or constructed or propose
clause_text: Yogalaya or Fitness Centre: In every residential building, either existing or constructed or proposed to be constructed for the use of existing or proposed Co-Operative Housing Society or an Apartment Owners Association, a Yogalaya or Fitness Centre including toilet facilities will be permitted subject to following conditions:

source_pdf.text_snippet: Yogalaya or Fitness Centre: In every residential building, either existing or constructed or proposed to be constructed for the use of existing or proposed Co-Operative Housing Society or an Apartment
